        {
            "title": "Open Source Social Media Publishing Tool",
            "url": "https://multipost.app/",
            "description": "MultiPost is an open source browser extension that helps you publish content to multiple social media platforms with one click. Save time and boost your social media presence.",
            "content": "Streamline Your Social Media Workflow
-------------------------------------

Save time and maintain consistency across all your social media platforms with our powerful features

Powerful Analytics
------------------

Comprehensive data analysis to help you make informed decisions

### Web Trace

Web Trace is a powerful website tracking tool that helps you understand and analyze your website traffic.

#### Real-time Statistics

Track real-time website visitor data

#### Visitor Analysis

Understand visitor sources, locations, and behavior patterns

#### Performance Monitoring

Monitor website loading speed and performance metrics

### Social Media Analytics

Comprehensive social media data analysis to help optimize your content strategy

#### Engagement Metrics

Track likes, comments, shares, and other engagement metrics

#### Audience Insights

Understand your follower demographics and behavior

#### Content Performance

Analyze performance of different content types

Powerful Yet Simple
-------------------

Write once, publish everywhere

Preview how your post will look on each platform

Schedule posts for optimal timing

Track post performance across platforms

[Install Extension](https://multipost.app/extension)

![Image 1: Demo Preview](https://multipost.app/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2F2someone-web-static.s3.bitiful.net%2F2025%2F04%2F40e625c0dfdc264852fc23eb3829fc79.png&w=3840&q=75)

Built by the Community, for the Community
-----------------------------------------

MultiPost is open source and free forever. Join us in building the future of social media management.

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

### How does MultiPost work?

MultiPost is a browser extension that uses your existing social media logins to publish content. No need for additional authentication or API keys.

### Which platforms are supported?

We currently support Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Instagram, and more. The list is growing with community contributions.

### Is it really free?

Yes! MultiPost is completely free and open source. You can use all features without any restrictions.

### How can I contribute?

You can contribute by starring the repository, reporting issues, submitting pull requests, or improving documentation.

Start Publishing Smarter Today
------------------------------

Join our growing community of content creators and developers",

Overview


----------

MultiPost is a tool to help you sync and publish content across multiple platforms.

Multipost will assist you in planning and automating the publication of content for self-media, allowing you to publish content to multiple platforms with a single click.

Details
-------

*   Version
    
    1.1.1
    
*   Updated
    
    April 14, 2025
    

*   Offered by
    
    leaperone
    
*   Size
    
    1.84MiB
    
*   Languages
    
    2 languages
    
*   Developer
    
    Emailsupport@leaper.one
    
*   Non-trader
    
    This developer has not identified itself as a trader. For consumers in the European Union, please note that consumer rights do not apply to contracts between you and this developer.
    

Privacy
-------

The developer has disclosed that it will not collect or use your data. To learn more, see the developer’s [privacy policy](https://multipost.app/legal/privacy).

This developer declares that your data is
-----------------------------------------

*   Not being sold to third parties, outside of the [approved use cases](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/webstore/program-policies/limited-use/)
*   Not being used or transferred for purposes that are unrelated to the item's core functionality
*   Not being used or transferred to determine creditworthiness or for lending purposes

Support
-------

For help with questions, suggestions, or problems, visit the developer's [support site](https://multipost.app/legal/terms)

Key Features
------------

[](https://github.com/leaperone/MultiPost-Extension#key-features)

*   Support synchronous posting to over 10 mainstream platforms including Zhihu, Weibo, Xiaohongshu, TikTok, etc.
*   No login, no registration, no API Key required. Free!
*   Support multiple content types including text, images, and videos
*   Support web page integration, allowing you to develop your own web pages and set up automation using the extension's publishing features, such as:
    *   Automatically capture web content and publish to multiple platforms
    *   Schedule posts
    *   AI content generation integration

This extension solves the pain points of content creators when publishing across multiple platforms. Through a single edit, content can be synchronized to all platforms, greatly improving work efficiency.

Getting Started
---------------

[](https://github.com/leaperone/MultiPost-Extension#getting-started)

First, run the development server:

```shell
pnpm i

pnpm dev
```

In the browser extension page, open the developer mode, click `Load **unpacked** extension` and find `build/chrome-mv3-dev` to load it.

Building the Production Version
-------------------------------

[](https://github.com/leaperone/MultiPost-Extension#building-the-production-version)

Run the following command:

```shell
pnpm build
```

You can find the build content in the `build` folder

### File Structure

[](https://github.com/leaperone/MultiPost-Extension#file-structure)

> src/sync: This folder contains the code for operating on different platforms, where dynamic is related to dynamic publishing, and video is related to video publishing; any added platform needs to be registered in common.ts. components: This folder contains all the components for frontend interface operations.

### Development Environment

[](https://github.com/leaperone/MultiPost-Extension#development-environment)

It is recommended to use the package management tool `pnpm@latest-9` with Node.js version 20.

**Post Optimization**
---------------------

### **Did you know that each social media platform has distinct guidelines for audio copyright?**

#### On TikTok, YouTube, and Rumble, you'll find extensive libraries of free-to-use sounds and music that do not cross-comply. Our expertise keeps your accounts compliant, choosing the ideal audio for maximum reach on your posts.

### **Character and link constraints affect your captions and descriptions on various platforms.**

#### Not all captions work across platforms. Different character limits and link rules on each platform demand tedious effort from creators and brands. Multipost Digital optimizes your posts for these restrictions to maximize engagement.

Overview


----------

MultiPost 是一个帮助你在多个平台同步发布内容的工具。

Multipost 将辅助你通过自动化的方式规划自媒体的内容发布，一键将内容发布到多个平台。

Details
-------

*   Version
    
    1.1.1
    
*   Updated
    
    April 14, 2025
    

*   Offered by
    
    leaperone

data.title: Open Source Social Media Publishing Tool
data.description: MultiPost is an open source browser extension that helps you publish content to multiple social media platforms with one click. Save time and boost your social media presence.
data.content:
MultiPost - Open Source Social Media Publishing Tool
===============

open navigation menu

[![Image 1: MultiPost Logo](https://multipost.app/favicon.ico) MultiPost](https://multipost.app/)

*   [Dashboard](https://multipost.app/dashboard)
*   [Publish](https://multipost.app/dashboard/publish)
*   [Extension](https://multipost.app/extension)
*   [Documentation](https://docs.multipost.app/)
*   [About](https://multipost.app/about)

*   English
    
*   [Sign In](https://multipost.app/signin)

Draft

✍️📝✨

,

Post

📤🚀✨

and

Analytics

📊📈🔍

Publish content to all your social media accounts simultaneously, monitor and analyze all your websites and accountsall platforms

[Go to post](https://multipost.app/dashboard/publish)[Markdown Editor](https://md.multipost.app/)[Install Extension](https://multipost.app/extension)

Streamline Your Social Media Workflow
-------------------------------------

Save time and maintain consistency across all your social media platforms with our powerful features

### One-Click Publishing

Post to multiple platforms simultaneously with a single click

### No Extra Login

Uses your existing browser sessions - no additional authentication needed

### Platform Optimization

Automatically formats content for each platform's requirements

Powerful Analytics
------------------

Comprehensive data analysis to help you make informed decisions

### Web Trace

Web Trace is a powerful website tracking tool that helps you understand and analyze your website traffic.

#### Real-time Statistics

Track real-time website visitor data

#### Visitor Analysis

Understand visitor sources, locations, and behavior patterns

#### Performance Monitoring

Monitor website loading speed and performance metrics

### Social Media Analytics

Comprehensive social media data analysis to help optimize your content strategy

#### Engagement Metrics

Track likes, comments, shares, and other engagement metrics

#### Audience Insights

Understand your follower demographics and behavior

#### Content Performance

Analyze performance of different content types

Powerful Yet Simple
-------------------

Write once, publish everywhere

Preview how your post will look on each platform

Schedule posts for optimal timing

Track post performance across platforms

[Install Extension](https://multipost.app/extension)

![Image 2: Demo Preview](https://multipost.app/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2F2someone-web-static.s3.bitiful.net%2F2025%2F04%2F40e625c0dfdc264852fc23eb3829fc79.png&w=3840&q=75)

Built by the Community, for the Community
-----------------------------------------

MultiPost is open source and free forever. Join us in building the future of social media management.

[View on GitHub](https://github.com/leaperone/MultiPost-Extension)

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

### How does MultiPost work?

MultiPost is a browser extension that uses your existing social media logins to publish content. No need for additional authentication or API keys.

### Which platforms are supported?

We currently support Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Instagram, and more. The list is growing with community contributions.

### Is it really free?

Yes! MultiPost is completely free and open source. You can use all features without any restrictions.

### How can I contribute?

You can contribute by starring the repository, reporting issues, submitting pull requests, or improving documentation.

Start Publishing Smarter Today
------------------------------

Join our growing community of content creators and developers

[Install Extension](https://multipost.app/extension)[Star on GitHub](https://github.com/leaperone/MultiPost-Extension)

Streamline Your Social Media Workflow

[GitHub](https://github.com/leaperone "GitHub")

### Services

*   [Voite](https://voite.2some.one/)
*   [MultiPost](https://multipost.app/)
*   [2SOMEone](https://2some.one/)
*   [2SOMEren](https://2some.ren/)

### Legal
